report: This story demonstrates strong character development and conflict, with clear writing and solid logical flow. Minor areas could benefit from additional detail.
suggestions: Add more emotional introspection to key scenes.
Strengthen the subplot conflict for greater impact.
Clarify minor logic details in the resolution.
